questions.question: He ran as fast as he ………………………..
She …………………………… swim when she was just three.
Raju ……………………….. speak six languages.
questions.description: Can is used to make a request, to ask for permission or to express ability to do something.

questions.question: I don’t think I ………………………….. pass the test.
questions.description: Will is used to predict something, to express willingness or to announce a spontaneous decision.

questions.question: He failed the test because he …………………………….. answer only 2 questions.
He said that he ……………………….. help but he didn’t.
If I had enough money, I ………………………….. travel around the world.
questions.description: Would is the past form of will.

questions.question: If I were you, I …………………………… get that mole examined.
questions.description: Would is the past form of will.

questions.question: You ………………………….. borrow my car if you want.
questions.description: Can is used to make a request, to ask for permission or to express ability to do something.

questions.question: Who ……………………………. cook dinner today?
questions.description: Will is used to predict something, to express willingness or to announce a spontaneous decision.

questions.question: ………………………… you like to dance with me?
questions.description: Would is used in polite requests.

questions.question: I tried to solve the problem, but I …………………………...
